channel.title: Opening food shop in runescape.looking for employes and more
channel.description:
hello this is me blade arrow0 and my rs name is junozx and im running a food shop at fally bar and i need some employes with 40 cooking or higher. ill pay u depending on ur expirience in selling and cooking and what ur assigned to.It is currently a small food shop so i would need5 employes.the employes will have jobs assigned to them of what they make.so maybe 1 employe will be assigned to making pies and another employe will be assigned to making cakes.if u are one of the employes make alot of food depending on wta food ur assigned to make.the food shop will have 50% of on saturday,sundays and mondays.so if u want to become a employe contac me at krishant1995@hotmail.com . ty
-blade arrow5

item.title: Opening food shop in runescape.looking for employes and more
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“MybJames, post:5, topic:72815”]guys! He gives them the profits, jeez…

:rolleyes:[/quote]
People fish… They give them to this guy…
Then he sells the fish…
No mentioning of giving the profits back? ;D

Read full topic

item.description:
@blade_arrow0 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:72815”]Why wouldn’t the employee’s just cook it themselves and sell, instead of giving you ~half the cut?[/quote]but they will sell them selfs so i tell them wat to make and they sell

item.title: Opening food shop in runescape.looking for employes and more
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

jme_009:

Why wouldn’t the employee’s just cook it themselves and sell, instead of giving you ~half the cut?

Hes basically trying to get people to give them the hard work they put into this so he can take half the profits…

Read full topic
